title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to Hazardous wastes, Definition of Hazardous waste, The magnitude of the problem, Risk assessment, Environmental legislation, Characterisation and site assessment, Waste minimisation and resource recovery, Chemical, physical and biological treatment, Transportation of hazardous waste, Ground water contamination, Landfill disposal.
